documents_dashboard_document_ID_FR: A photocopy of the front and back of your proof of identity (passport, national ID card)
documents_dashboard_document_PROOF_OF_AD: Proof of address with your full name and the address indicated in your profile (dated within the last 3 months)
documents_dashboard_document_CORPORATE_I: Certificate of incorporation dated within the last 3 months
documents_dashboard_document_ADMINISTRAT: A national survey of registered businesses datasheet
documents_dashboard_document_ASSOCIATION: A copy of the public notice of meeting and minutes of the most recent meeting held
documents_dashboard_document_individual_: Any useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
documents_dashboard_document_corporation: If you are not listed in your company’s certificate of incorporation, please provide a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person specified therein.
documents_dashboard_document_association: If you are not listed in your company’s certificate of incorporation or articles of association, please provide a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person specified therein.
documents_dashboard_document_administrat: If you are not listed in your company’s certificate of incorporation or articles of association, please provide a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person specified therein.
documents_dashboard_document_other_OTHER: Any useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
